definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: My former house has turned into a wreck of tumbled walls.
sentences.chinese: 以前的房子現在已經變成頹垣斷壁了。

sentences.english: Buildings are on fire and massive debris has piled on roads.
sentences.chinese: 建築物着火，馬路上到處是頹垣斷壁。
